widgets.name: Memory: Top consuming apps last 24 hours

trend_definition.filter: employee_experience.resource_consumption.event_name IN ( 'app_resource_consumption' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.memory_usage_percentage > 90  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption._device_platform IN ( 'Windows Desktop' , 'Apple macOS' )

widgets.name: Top Network Consuming apps last 24 hrs

trend_definition.filter: employee_experience.resource_consumption.event_name IN ( 'app_resource_consumption' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption._device_platform IN ( 'Windows Desktop' , 'Apple macOS' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.network_interface_bytes_sec >= 100000

widgets.name: Top CPU Consuming apps last 24 hrs

trend_definition.filter: employee_experience.resource_consumption.event_name IN ( 'app_resource_consumption' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.device_make IN ( 'Apple Inc.' , 'Dell Inc.' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.processor_usage_percentage > 90

widgets.name: GPU: Top Consuming apps last 24 hrs

trend_definition.filter: employee_experience.resource_consumption.event_name IN ( 'app_resource_consumption' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.gpu_usage0 > 60  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption._device_platform IN ( 'Apple macOS' , 'Windows Desktop' )

widgets.name: Disk: Top Consuming apps last 24 hrs

trend_definition.filter: employee_experience.resource_consumption.event_name IN ( 'app_resource_consumption' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption._device_platform IN ( 'Windows Desktop' , 'Apple macOS' )  AND  employee_experience.resource_consumption.disk_io_bytes_sec > 2500000

widgets.name: Top Poorly Performing Apps Based on Usage
